sum_t5: QUICKLY . Day trading guideThe outlook for the stock of Tata Consumer Products is bullish. The stock has risen about 2 per cent on T uesday when the broader markets remained subdued. The 200-Day Moving Average (DMA) at /uni20B91,053 has been giving good support for more than a week. The region between /uni20B91,050 and /uni20B91,040 is a strong support zone which has been limiting the downside well.
